message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, I believe we can come to a more mutually beneficial agreement. I am willing to pay $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position, but I would like to remain within my budget. I am willing to pay $10500 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $11250. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. However, I must stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $11000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $11000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $11200. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I cannot agree to $11200. I am willing to pay $11100 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
